channel.title: 2024 on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 on courtside nyc

item.title: s&p lunch
item.description: thoughts worth wait in line 1-2 people perfect #, might wait longer for 3-4 menu highlights tuna melt pastrami

item.title: tokyo record bar
item.description: thoughts food is nothng fancy, but fun dining experience i chose “fantasy” by mariah carey :) bar upstairs is p cool

item.title: cervo's
item.description: thoughts everything is good, not a single miss

item.title: noble rot
item.description: locations lamb’s conduit soho mayfair thoughts amazing wine list cozy menu highlights gnocchi

item.title: lord's
item.description: thoughts sit at bar not for picky eaters menu highlights tiny martini pig’s head duck pie oysters

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: apollo bagels
item.description: thoughts sourdough (not new york style) avoid weekends, line is too long (hour+) menu highlights small, fixed menu honestly plain bagel with butter and jam goes crazy

item.title: bad hombre
item.description: thoughts took a long time to make our drinks, but brought us a free dessert menu highlights aguachille skirt steak

item.title: b&h dairy
item.description: thoughts different deal every day of the week menu highlights tuna melt

item.title: hooked
item.description: thoughts very fun concept, they bring out the available fish and you get to choose. they course it out for you (poke, sashimi, cooked, etc) all with the same fish

item.title: hen house nyc
item.description: thoughts lebanese shawarma menu highlights piri piri fried chicken sando if “fully loaded” is presented as an option, do it

item.title: sappe
item.description: thoughts they have semi private room for party of 8, super cozy staff were so kind and patient with my large group pre-fixe $80 for more than 8 people menu highlights online cocktail menu krapow moo grob ribs (rack)

item.title: pinch chinese
item.description: thoughts highlight for me was actually the wine list ? brought out sparkler for my friend’s birthday menu highlights spicy wontons brussel sprouts

item.title: tatiana by kwame onwuachi
item.description: thoughts walk into lincoln center, it’s on the right menu highlights everything we ate was insanely good my two favorites were the egusi dumplings & the short rib pastrami suya

item.title: málà project
item.description: 4 locations thoughts yummy menu highlights dry pot (spicy) eggplant app is fire

item.title: the nines
item.description: thoughts acme downstairs, opens 10:30 max table holds 6 people

item.title: veeray da dhaba
item.description: menu highlights veeray di gobhi

item.title: golden diner
item.description: thoughts walk-in only on weekends (waits can range anywhere from 1-4 hours lol) go during week when they accept resys menu highlights pancake tuna melt

item.title: revelie luncheonette
item.description: thoughts would go just to hang with eric again walk-in only menu highlights green chile cheeseburger chopped cheese egg sandwich

item.title: domo domo
item.description: thoughts when the sushi craving hits and needs to be resolved asap but there’s cheaper + better omakase

item.title: konbon
item.description: thoughts fantastic menu highlights scallop carpaccio mazemen (not spicy) corn dessert is so realistic i looked at the table next to us trying to cut theirs in half and thought to myself “who the fuck cuts corn like that”
